title: Disable search bar on empty chat state and fix pull-to-refresh gesture
body:
# Problem
1. The current implementation of the searchbar only includes searching the local chat list. When the list is empty, there are no items to search. In context of the empty state screen the search bar can easily be misinterpreted as a way to 'search for public channels'. See image below.

![Screenshot_20191204-095055_Status](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/35233054/70129326-d268df00-167e-11ea-8999-bab99ed7c20b.jpg)

2. Additionally, when you pull to refresh, the search bar appears and then disappears immediately, so it can not be used. [See gif.](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9540#issue-529398936) 


## Implementation
Disable pull to show Search bar on empty state of chat.
Fix search bar appearance when pulling to refresh screen. 

## Acceptance Criteria
Pulling down on the empty state screen of chat does not show the search bar.
cc @errorists @rachelhamlin
Great point. Mind if I bounty this?
maybe bundle it with this one? https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9540

Issue Status: 1. **Open** 2. Started 3. Submitted 4. Done
__This issue now has a funding of 75.0 DAI (75.0 USD @ $1.0/DAI) attached to it.__ * If you would like to work on this issue you can 'start work' [on the Gitcoin Issue Details page](https://gitcoin.co/issue/status-im/status-react/9576/3784). * Want to chip in? Issue Status: 1. Open 2. **Cancelled** 

<hr>

__Work has been started__.


These users each claimed they can complete the work by 5 months ago.
Please review their action plans below:


**1) [ognian7](https://gitcoin.co/ognian7) has been approved to start work.**

1. Implement the check for the empty list and Disable pull to show Search bar on empty state of chat.
2. I will fix the search bar appearance when pulling to refresh screen.
3. Create tests
**2) [loganbek](https://gitcoin.co/loganbek) has applied to start work _(Funders only: [approve worker](https://gitcoin.co/issue/status-im/status-react/9576/3784?mutate_worker_action=approve&worker=loganbek) | [reject worker](https://gitcoin.co/issue/status-im/status-react/9576/3784?mutate_worker_action=reject&worker=loganbek))_.**

I will remove the search bar on empty chat state and fix the search bar on pull gesture.

Learn more [on the Gitcoin Issue Details page](https://gitcoin.co/issue/status-im/status-react/9576/3784).
